name: starttls-frontend
description: Static front end for the STARTTLS scanner

scripts.templates:watch: yarn run templates:build && onchange 'js/templates/*' -- yarn run templates:build
scripts.js:install: mkdir -p static/vendor && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js node_modules/raven-js/dist/raven.js node_modules/handlebars/dist/handlebars.runtime.min.js static/vendor
scripts.js:build: yarn run js:install && yarn run js:templates && babel js --out-file static/application.js
scripts.js:watch: yarn run js:install && parallelshell 'yarn run templates:watch' 'babel js --watch --out-file static/application.js --source-maps'
scripts.build: yarn run sass:build && yarn run js:build && hugo --config config.prod.toml,config.toml
scripts.serve: yarn run sass:build && parallelshell 'yarn run sass:watch' 'yarn run js:watch' 'hugo serve --config config.dev.toml,config.toml'

author: Electronic Frontier Foundation
